description: Numbers n such that 10*R_n + 3 is prime, where R_n is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (10^(n+1)+17)/9 is prime.a(14) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Nov 01 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 11...113.
